[14/10/22, 4:14:33 PM] â€ª+91Â 70137Â 23609â€¬: â€This message was deleted.

pls confirm you read this.

This chat appears to be a conversation between a group of instructors and a partner of a company, possibly related to education technology. The partner has created the group to update the instructors on the progress and issues related to a live program being implemented in schools. The group includes various teams such as LnD team, tech support team, and Dev team. Instructors are added to the group by the partner and they discuss issues related to a platform called "wizskill" not working and tokens expiring. There is also discussion about testing a device online, receiving kits from the company, and sharing documents related to orientation for teachers and parents.
